name: 7 Cups Of Tea - Purple
description:
A style I am working on for 7 Cups Of Tea. This is not endorsed or affiliated in any way with 7 Cups Of Tea or its partners.

Current skin status is as follows.

Full Support:

*1-1 Chat Interface
*Group Chat Interface
*General Requests Interface
*Forum Interface
*User Profiles
*Training & Certification
*Calendar
*My Impact

Partial Support:

*CK Editor (forum editor for posts)

The rest of the site may be a hit or miss until I confirm things are (to the best of my knowledge) complete! But I am trying to roll out updates as fast as I can so hopefully I will get to mapping out the ENTIRE 7COT site! :)

If you enjoy the style and wish to support my drive for expanding my skills and recreational hobby you may feel free to donate using the button below (strictly optional!). :)
